step.tex: f(x) \text{ is a straight line for }x\neq 1.\\ \text{Hence, it is continuous for all }x\neq 1.\\ \text{But we need to check for continuity at }x=1.
step.reason: \text{At }x=1\text{, the definition of the function}\\ \text{changes. Hence, x = 1 could be the only}\\ \text{problem point. We should check for}\\ \text{continuity there.}
\text{Since, f(x) is continuous at x}\neq 1\text{(step 2)}\\ \therefore x=1\text{ is the only point of discontinuity.}

choices.tex: \text{Continuous at x=0,2 but\\ discontinuous at x=1}
